short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension to automatically highlight domains with colors across your open tabs with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lost your place in the middle of a bunch of opened tabs? Presenting Tab Domain Highlighter – a browser extension to help improve the way you work with tabs and your overall browsing experience. With this extension, you can color each domain in the open tabs with a different hue just by a single click. This separation of the visual interface renders it rather easy to distinguish and differentiate between various websites, without consuming unnecessary time and energy. 

Key Features of Tab Domain Highlighter:

Instant Highlighting: In a rather simple and natural manner, you can easily highlight domains in your tabs.

Color Coding: The color code is used where each domain is given a different color that makes it different from other domains.

One-Click Activation: Intuitive design of the program and the options enables the quick start.

Improved Organization: Stay organized and minimize the number of your tabs opened to make it easy to navigate.

How to Use:

1: Install the Extension

•Go to the browser’s extension section and download “Tab Domain Highlighter” from the list by clicking on the install button
•However, to support the claims presented in this paper, the Extension needs to be activated.
•After the installation process is complete, you will be able to see the icon of Tab Domain Highlighter in the upper part of the page of your browser, so you need to click on it to run the extension.

  2: Highlight Domains

•Once you have the extension activated, click on the Tab Domain Highlighter again to highlight the domain names of the tabs currently open. In this project, each domain is going to have its own color differentiation.

3. Manage your Tabs

•Most of the time, I am using multiple tabs to browse through different sites, thus the need to learn how to manage tabs.
•This is because with color-coded tabs, the user can easily identify and manage his tabs in relation to the domain names they belong to and enhance the efficiency of his browsing.
 
Who Can Find Useful Information?

Tab Domain Highlighter is a tool that can benefit any user who works with tabs on a regular basis. From a student perspective, they will be able to organize educational resources that they may need in their studies, working professional will be able to organize work-related tabs, developers can easily organize different environments they may be working on a general web browsers users will also be able to organize the tabs in a much better way.

Why it is Useful?

The Tab Domain Highlighter organizes the tabs by color-code to make it easier to know which domains are included. It increases productivity since there will be less time spent looking for the tabs we have opened. It means that the given colours are distinguishing and help to avoid confusion while adding pleasure to the process of browsing. In this manner, with a single click, you can successfully enhance your browsing routine and sort the information received.

FAQs

1.What is the process I need to follow to install Tab Domain Highlighter?

These include Go to your browser’s extension list and look for “Tab Domain Highlighter” then click install.

2.Can you tell me how to enable this extension?

Once installed, in the browser's toolbar, click on the Tab Domain Highlighter icon to start using the application.

3. Is it possible to change the color for every domain?

This is the current state of the extension; it uses default colors for each domain and does not allow for individual configuration.

4. I am asking this because I want to know if Tab Domain Highlighter will affect the speed of my browser in any way.
No, Tab Domain Highlighter is a very light add-on and should not slow down your browser in any way.

5. What should I do when the extension is not working?
It may be helpful to try to clear your cache and cookies, or to close and open your browser again, and to reinstall the extension. If problems still exist, look up the extension’s support page for ways to solve them.
